sentences.en: Achenes 8 - ribbed, white pilose; pappus scabrous, 10 - 12 mm long, connate at base.
sentences.cn: 瘦果纺锤形,具8条纵棱, 被白色长柔毛; 冠毛粗糙, 长 10-12 毫米, 基部联合.

sentences.en: Her face buried itself in his scabrous shirt.
sentences.cn: 她把脸埋在他那粗糙的衬衣里。

sentences.en: It differs in the smaller size of all parts and rufous scabrous tomentum .
sentences.cn: 它在全株各部分较小和红棕色的粗糙的绒毛层的方面不同。

sentences.en: It differs in the smaller size of all parts and rufous scabrous tomentum.
sentences.cn: 它在全株各部分较小和红棕色的粗糙的绒毛层的方面不同。

sentences.en: Leaves densely glandular and abaxially scabrous ; corolla white with a yellow center.
sentences.cn: 浓密的叶具腺和背面粗糙；花冠白色具一个黄的中心。

sentences.en: Plants sparsely scabrous; ultimate leaf segments irregularly serrate or dentate.
sentences.cn: 装置疏生粗糙; 不规则的末级的叶裂片有锯齿或具牙齿.

sentences.en: The book includes some memorably seedy characters and scabrous description.
sentences.cn: 这本书包含了一些难忘下流的角色及有伤风化的描述.

words.tran_cn: 粗糙的；难解决的；猥亵的

trans.tran_cn: 粗糙的，困难的：难对付的，棘手的，粗俗的
trans.tran_en: rude or shocking, especially in a sexual way
